page.title: 04Education
page.content: John of Gaunt School is a Comprehensive school with pupils from Hungerford and surrounding villages. There are 48 teaching staff,11 kitchen, 2 caretakers, 17 cleaners 2 assistants. A full range of subjects is taught with well equipped kitchens and laboratories for Home Economics and Science subjects. A new Computer department has just been established. Television and Video recorders are used in many subjects to compliment text books. There is an active Physical Education department. Exchange visits with Twin Town school are made annually. A comprehensive range or subjects is available at an Adult Education centre at the school. There are vocational and recreational classes. Students range from school leavers to O.A.P'S
